text:
[{"q":"When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.","a":"Sydney Smith","c":"98","h":"
“When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.” —
Sydney Smith
"},{"q":"The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.","a":"Jim Rohn","c":"120","h":"
“The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.” —
Jim Rohn
"},{"q":"It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.","a":"Charles Spurgeon","c":"72","h":"
“It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.” —
Charles Spurgeon
"},{"q":"Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.","a":"Dr. Seuss","c":"55","h":"
“Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.” —
Dr. Seuss
"},{"q":"The seasons do not push one another; neither do clouds race the wind across the sky. All things happen in their own good time.","a":"Dan Millman","c":"126","h":"
“The seasons do not push one another; neither do clouds race the wind across the sky. All things happen in their own good time.” —
Dan Millman
"},{"q":"You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.","a":"Barack Obama","c":"80","h":"
“You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.” —
Barack Obama
"},{"q":"If they wrote it to make money, don't read it.","a":"Naval Ravikant","c":"46","h":"
“If they wrote it to make money, don't read it.” —
Naval Ravikant
"},{"q":"A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.","a":"J.R.R. Tolkien","c":"86","h":"
“A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien
"},{"q":"The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.","a":"Carlos Ruiz Zafon","c":"111","h":"
“The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon
"},{"q":"For fast-acting relief try slowing down.","a":"Lily Tomlin","c":"40","h":"
“For fast-acting relief try slowing down.” —
Lily Tomlin
"},{"q":"Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.","a":"Thomas Jefferson","c":"51","h":"
“Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.” —
Thomas Jefferson
"},{"q":"Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.","a":"Socrates","c":"79","h":"
“Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.” —
Socrates
"},{"q":"Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.","a":"Roy T. Bennett","c":"68","h":"
“Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.” —
Roy T. Bennett
"},{"q":"Failure is a great teacher. If you're open to it every mistake has a lesson to offer.","a":"Oprah Winfrey","c":"85","h":"
“Failure is a great teacher. If you're open to it every mistake has a lesson to offer.” —
Oprah Winfrey
"},{"q":"To forget the whole world is easy; to make the whole world forget you is hard.","a":"Zhuangzi","c":"78","h":"
“To forget the whole world is easy; to make the whole world forget you is hard.” —
Zhuangzi
"},{"q":"Trust is the glue that holds people together and is the lubricant that keeps an organization moving forward.","a":"Colin Powell","c":"108","h":"
“Trust is the glue that holds people together and is the lubricant that keeps an organization moving forward.” —
Colin Powell
"},{"q":"Be gentle with yourself. Think less and feel more. Be as happy as you can. You only have this moment.","a":"Dan Millman","c":"101","h":"
“Be gentle with yourself. Think less and feel more. Be as happy as you can. You only have this moment.” —
Dan Millman
"},{"q":"I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.","a":"Og Mandino","c":"108","h":"
“I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.” —
Og Mandino
"},{"q":"They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.","a":"Audrey Hepburn","c":"84","h":"
“They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.” —
Audrey Hepburn
"},{"q":"The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.","a":"Ming-Dao Deng","c":"84","h":"
“The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.” —
Ming-Dao Deng
"},{"q":"Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.","a":"Henry David Thoreau","c":"45","h":"
“Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.” —
Henry David Thoreau
"},{"q":"Stop wasting time looking at someone else's reality while doing nothing about yours.","a":"Steve Harvey","c":"84","h":"
“Stop wasting time looking at someone else's reality while doing nothing about yours.” —
Steve Harvey
"},{"q":"Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.","a":"Josh Waitzkin","c":"93","h":"
“Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.” —
Josh Waitzkin
"},{"q":"To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow. ","a":"Audrey Hepburn","c":"46","h":"
“To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow. ” —
Audrey Hepburn
"},{"q":"Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more. ","a":"Nikola Tesla","c":"105","h":"
“Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more. ” —
Nikola Tesla
"},{"q":"A diamond is a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.","a":"Unknown","c":"72","h":"
“A diamond is a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.” —
Unknown
"},{"q":"Trust is the foundation of great leadership.","a":"Lolly Daskal","c":"44","h":"
“Trust is the foundation of great leadership.” —
Lolly Daskal
"},{"q":"Living life in style also means living a life of balance.","a":"Jim Rohn","c":"57","h":"
“Living life in style also means living a life of balance.” —
Jim Rohn
"},{"q":"I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.","a":"Robert Kiyosaki","c":"49","h":"
“I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.” —
Robert Kiyosaki
"},{"q":"Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.","a":"Aristotle","c":"91","h":"
“Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.” —
Aristotle
"},{"q":"It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.","a":"Rumi","c":"93","h":"
“It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.” —
Rumi
"},{"q":"You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.","a":"Steve Maraboli","c":"79","h":"
“You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.” —
Steve Maraboli
"},{"q":"We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.","a":"Les Brown","c":"71","h":"
“We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.” —
Les Brown
"},{"q":"Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.","a":"Earl Nightingale","c":"107","h":"
“Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.” —
Earl Nightingale
"},{"q":"Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.","a":"Miguel de Cervantes","c":"62","h":"
“Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.” —
Miguel de Cervantes
"},{"q":"I pay attention to every minute of the day.","a":"Steve Harvey","c":"43","h":"
“I pay attention to every minute of the day.” —
Steve Harvey
"},{"q":"I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.","a":"Tony Robbins","c":"147","h":"
“I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.” —
Tony Robbins
"},{"q":"It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ","a":"Brian Tracy","c":"86","h":"
“It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ” —
Brian Tracy
"},{"q":"When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.","a":"Paulo Coelho","c":"86","h":"
“When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.” —
Paulo Coelho
"},{"q":"A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.","a":"Dogen","c":"46","h":"
“A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.” —
Dogen
"},{"q":"Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.","a":"Robin Sharma","c":"73","h":"
“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma
"},{"q":"Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.","a":"Woody Allen","c":"62","h":"
“Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.” —
Woody Allen
"},{"q":"Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.","a":"Coco Chanel","c":"53","h":"
“Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.” —
Coco Chanel
"},{"q":"Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.","a":"Estee Lauder","c":"73","h":"
“Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.” —
Estee Lauder
"},{"q":"The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.","a":"George Bernard Shaw","c":"84","h":"
“The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.” —
George Bernard Shaw
"},{"q":"Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.","a":"Gilbert Chesterton","c":"115","h":"
“Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.” —
Gilbert Chesterton
"},{"q":"While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.","a":"Benjamin Franklin","c":"98","h":"
“While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.” —
Benjamin Franklin
"},{"q":"Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.","a":"Norman Vincent Peale","c":"76","h":"
“Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.” —
Norman Vincent Peale
"},{"q":"A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.","a":"Jonathan Swift","c":"70","h":"
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift
"},{"q":"A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.","a":"Charles Darwin","c":"81","h":"
“A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.” —
Charles Darwin
"}]

json.q: When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.
json.h:
“When you rise in the morning, form a resolution to make the day a happy one for a fellow creature.” —
Sydney Smith

json.q: The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.
json.h:
“The only way it gets better for you is when you get better. Better is not something you wish, it's something you become.” —
Jim Rohn

json.q: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
json.h:
“It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.” —
Charles Spurgeon

json.q: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
json.h:
“Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.” —
Dr. Seuss

json.q: The seasons do not push one another; neither do clouds race the wind across the sky. All things happen in their own good time.
json.h:
“The seasons do not push one another; neither do clouds race the wind across the sky. All things happen in their own good time.” —
Dan Millman

json.q: You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.
json.h:
“You can't let your failures define you. You have to let your failures teach you.” —
Barack Obama

json.q: If they wrote it to make money, don't read it.
json.h:
“If they wrote it to make money, don't read it.” —
Naval Ravikant

json.q: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
json.h:
“A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

json.q: The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.
json.h:
“The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

json.q: For fast-acting relief try slowing down.
json.h:
“For fast-acting relief try slowing down.” —
Lily Tomlin

json.q: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
json.h:
“Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.” —
Thomas Jefferson

json.q: Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.
json.h:
“Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.” —
Socrates

json.q: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.
json.h:
“Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.” —
Roy T. Bennett

json.q: Failure is a great teacher. If you're open to it every mistake has a lesson to offer.
json.h:
“Failure is a great teacher. If you're open to it every mistake has a lesson to offer.” —
Oprah Winfrey

json.q: To forget the whole world is easy; to make the whole world forget you is hard.
json.h:
“To forget the whole world is easy; to make the whole world forget you is hard.” —
Zhuangzi

json.q: Trust is the glue that holds people together and is the lubricant that keeps an organization moving forward.
json.h:
“Trust is the glue that holds people together and is the lubricant that keeps an organization moving forward.” —
Colin Powell

json.q: Be gentle with yourself. Think less and feel more. Be as happy as you can. You only have this moment.
json.h:
“Be gentle with yourself. Think less and feel more. Be as happy as you can. You only have this moment.” —
Dan Millman

json.q: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
json.h:
“I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.” —
Og Mandino

json.q: They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.
json.h:
“They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.” —
Audrey Hepburn

json.q: The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
json.h:
“The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

json.q: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
json.h:
“Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.” —
Henry David Thoreau

json.q: Stop wasting time looking at someone else's reality while doing nothing about yours.
json.h:
“Stop wasting time looking at someone else's reality while doing nothing about yours.” —
Steve Harvey

json.q: Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.
json.h:
“Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.” —
Josh Waitzkin

json.q: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.
json.h:
“To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow. ” —
Audrey Hepburn

json.q: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
json.h:
“Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more. ” —
Nikola Tesla

json.q: A diamond is a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.
json.h:
“A diamond is a piece of charcoal that handled stress exceptionally well.” —
Unknown

json.q: Trust is the foundation of great leadership.
json.h:
“Trust is the foundation of great leadership.” —
Lolly Daskal

json.q: Living life in style also means living a life of balance.
json.h:
“Living life in style also means living a life of balance.” —
Jim Rohn

json.q: I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.
json.h:
“I'd rather welcome change than cling to the past.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

json.q: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
json.h:
“Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.” —
Aristotle

json.q: It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.
json.h:
“It's your road, and yours alone, others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.” —
Rumi

json.q: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
json.h:
“You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.” —
Steve Maraboli

json.q: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
json.h:
“We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.” —
Les Brown

json.q: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
json.h:
“Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.” —
Earl Nightingale

json.q: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.
json.h:
“Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.” —
Miguel de Cervantes

json.q: I pay attention to every minute of the day.
json.h:
“I pay attention to every minute of the day.” —
Steve Harvey

json.q: I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.
json.h:
“I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.” —
Tony Robbins

json.q: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
json.h:
“It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ” —
Brian Tracy

json.q: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
json.h:
“When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.” —
Paulo Coelho

json.q: A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.
json.h:
“A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.” —
Dogen

json.q: Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.
json.h:
“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma

json.q: Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.
json.h:
“Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.” —
Woody Allen

json.q: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
json.h:
“Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.” —
Coco Chanel

json.q: Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.
json.h:
“Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.” —
Estee Lauder

json.q: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
json.h:
“The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.” —
George Bernard Shaw

json.q: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.
json.h:
“Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

json.q: While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.
json.h:
“While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.” —
Benjamin Franklin

json.q: Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.
json.h:
“Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

json.q: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
json.h:
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift

json.q: A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.
json.h:
“A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.” —
Charles Darwin

“Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.” —
Earl Nightingale
"},{"q":"Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.","a":"Miguel de Cervantes","c":"62","h":"
“Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.” —
Miguel de Cervantes
"},{"q":"I pay attention to every minute of the day.","a":"Steve Harvey","c":"43","h":"
“I pay attention to every minute of the day.” —
Steve Harvey
"},{"q":"I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.","a":"Tony Robbins","c":"147","h":"
“I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.” —
Tony Robbins
"},{"q":"It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ","a":"Brian Tracy","c":"86","h":"
“It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ” —
Brian Tracy
"},{"q":"When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.","a":"Paulo Coelho","c":"86","h":"
“When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.” —
Paulo Coelho
"},{"q":"A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.","a":"Dogen","c":"46","h":"
“A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.” —
Dogen
"},{"q":"Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.","a":"Robin Sharma","c":"73","h":"
“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma
"},{"q":"Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.","a":"Woody Allen","c":"62","h":"
“Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.” —
Woody Allen
"},{"q":"Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.","a":"Coco Chanel","c":"53","h":"
“Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.” —
Coco Chanel
"},{"q":"Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.","a":"Estee Lauder","c":"73","h":"
“Anyone who wants to achieve a dream must stay strong, focused and steady.” —
Estee Lauder
"},{"q":"The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.","a":"George Bernard Shaw","c":"84","h":"
“The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.” —
George Bernard Shaw
"},{"q":"Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.","a":"Gilbert Chesterton","c":"115","h":"
“Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die.” —
Gilbert Chesterton
"},{"q":"While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.","a":"Benjamin Franklin","c":"98","h":"
“While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.” —
Benjamin Franklin
"},{"q":"Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.","a":"Norman Vincent Peale","c":"76","h":"
“Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.” —
Norman Vincent Peale
"},{"q":"A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.","a":"Jonathan Swift","c":"70","h":"
“A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.” —
Jonathan Swift
"},{"q":"A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.","a":"Charles Darwin","c":"81","h":"
“A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.” —
Charles Darwin
"}]
